---
title: "Enter title here"
execute:
  keep-md: false
lightbox: true
format:
  html:
    from: markdown+emoji
    anchor-sections: true
    mainfont: FiraCode Nerd Font Mono
    code-annotations: hover
    code-tools: true
    code-fold: show
    code-overflow: scroll
    code-copy: true
    code-link: true
    theme:
      dark: solar
      light: lux
    highlight-style: ayu-mirage
    fig-responsive: true
    footnotes-hover: true
    code-block-border-left: "#4f6952"
    html-math-method: mathjax
    number-sections: false
    df-print: paged
    smooth-scroll: true
    respect-user-color-scheme: true
toc: true
toc-depth: 2
toc-title: Contents
toc-location: right # default
knitr:
    opts_chunk:
      dev: "ragg_png"
      dpi: 300
      fig.align: "center"
      fig.retina: 3
      fig.width: 6
      out.width: "75%"
      collapse: true
      results: markup
      cache: true
---

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
options(
  warnPartialMatchArgs = FALSE,
  warnPartialMatchDollar = FALSE,
  datatable.print.trunc.cols = TRUE,
  cli.unicode = TRUE,
  rlang_backtrace_on_error_report = "collapse",
  rlang_backtrace_on_error = "branch",
  rlang_trace_top_env = environment(),
  digits = 3,
  width = 110,
  knitr.kable.NA = "",
  crayon.enabled = TRUE,
  cli.ignore_unknown_rstudio_theme = TRUE,
  brms.backend = "cmdstanr",
  brms.file_refit = "on_change"
)

ragg_png <- function(..., res = 150) {
  ragg::agg_png(..., res = res, units = "in")
}
```
